channel.title: Need Help *when u can help me i award u*
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left][b]I can,t Do The Command ::pickup How that can plz help me post it on moparscapeforum or un bulletscapeforum http://bulletscape.smfforfree2.com
i Know ::pickup Item Amount But Somthing Wrong In My Client.java i Think
When U Can Help Me U Get This -BulletScape Administrator -BulletScape Forum Moderator -Many Many Thanks :)[/b][/shadow]

item.title: Need Help *when u can help me i award u*
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

well heres my command

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

replace urs with that and it should work =]

`n0va

Edit* feel free to edit w/e you want

Read full topic
